channel.title: CozmiKast
channel.description: Metaphysical banter. Special guests. Stuttering. Podsafe music by people you know. Topical debates, and creams. Get Involved.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Hippies Gone Wild
channel.itunes:author: CozmiKast: Marcus Del Greco
channel.itunes:summary: Metaphysical banter. Special guests. Stuttering. Podsafe music by people you know. Topical debates, and creams. Get Involved.

item.title: Episode #45: CozmiKast Holiday Special 2010
item.description: Mr. Marcus & Ramrozi are back, after a short 3 year hiatus, with episode 45. Ramrozi has hearing issues and complains frequently about the audio, which turned out fine-ish.
item.author: marcus@mindmined.com (CozmiKast: Marcus Del Greco)
item.itunes:author: CozmiKast: Marcus Del Greco
item.itunes:subtitle: Skype To The Rescue in a Blizzard
item.itunes:summary: Mr. Marcus & Ramrozi are back, after a short 3 year hiatus, with episode 45. Ramrozi has hearing issues and complains frequently about the audio, which turned out fine-ish.

item.title: Episode #44: Storybook Pages
item.description: Fresh out of the oven here at the Mind Mined Studio, artists in residence Blended Wood And The Clean Mint debut their first video "Storybook Pages". Shot and starring Kai and Brit Dennett.
item.author: marcus@mindmined.com (CozmiKast: Marcus Del Greco)
item.itunes:author: CozmiKast: Marcus Del Greco
item.itunes:subtitle: the new video from Blended Wood And The Clean Mint
item.itunes:summary: Fresh out of the oven here at the Mind Mined Studio, artists in residence Blended Wood And The Clean Mint debut their first video "Storybook Pages". Shot and starring Kai and Brit Dennett.

item.title: Episode #43: A Nearly Normal Formation
item.description:
Featured Music: live at Mind Mined Studio Zero with The Nearly Normal, "O Christmas Tree" by South of France, "Loving You, Impaired" and "Rolling Onto Memphis" by Pondering Judd.
Jamie, Eben, Mike, Kai, Brit and Jennifer from The Nearly Normal extended family stop in for some live jamming in the studio and
